channel.title: Comments for Shrewd Adventurer
channel.description: shrewd: marked by clever discerning awareness and hardheaded acumen

item.title: Comment on A Different Side of Italy – A Weekend in Nicotera and Tropea by yazmin ibarra
item.dc:creator: yazmin ibarra
item.description: Hi! I'm spending a month in Italy starting next weekend (!!) and I booked 5 days in Tropea. I'm all set as for hotels and transportation but the place I'll be staying at is downtown, and I can't find info about the beach. Do I have to pay to access? Or do I need a taxi to get there? Any info would be great. Thanks!
item.content:encoded: Hi! I’m spending a month in Italy starting next weekend (!!) and I booked 5 days in Tropea. I’m all set as for hotels and transportation but the place I’ll be staying at is downtown, and I can’t find info about the beach. Do I have to pay to access? Or do I need a taxi to get there? Any info would be great. Thanks!
